the application interface
[wifi howto] 

	After run "ifconfig wlan0 up ", we need load the firmware .
	The firmware(Rt73): /lib/firmware/rt73.bin
	According to the following steps to load the firmware.
		echo 1 > /sys/class/firmware/1-1.2\:1.0/loading
		cat  /lib/firmware/rt73.bin > sys/class/firmware/1-1.2\:1.0/data    
		echo 0 > /sys/class/firmware/1-1.2\:1.0/loading

CHINA. FuJian Newland Computer CO., Ltd
